head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths GEBOT, FELISA LUMERMAN

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths GEBOT, FELISA LUMERMAN

block.p: GEBOT-Felisa Lumerman. Beloved mother of Vicky Sapper, and Lia Chasen, devoted grandmother of Vivian, Danielle, Nicole, Billy, and Lauren, and great grandmother of Sarah, Sabrina, and Gabriella. Journalist, teacher, and mentor to many. Services at Gutterman's, Woodbury, Wednesday June 21, 2000 at 9:30 A.M.

GEBOT-Felisa Lumerman. Beloved mother of Vicky Sapper, and Lia Chasen, devoted grandmother of Vivian, Danielle, Nicole, Billy, and Lauren, and great grandmother of Sarah, Sabrina, and Gabriella. Journalist, teacher, and mentor to many. Services at Gutterman's, Woodbury, Wednesday June 21, 2000 at 9:30 A.M.
